name: Bridged
description:
Feedback form: https://forms.gle/5gE6s1bXdSTVJWpJ9

Bug report form: https://forms.gle/xJtNAdE7Fq8YFJACA

This project is in early Alpha.

Bridged is a 2d platformer puzzle game. You reach the end goal to progress through to the next stage.

Controls

  • Horizontal movement: A,D / Left and Right arrow keys:
  • Jump: W, Space bar, Up arrow
  • Switch Characters: Q,E
  • Interact: F
